results.title: The Potential Therapeutic Application of Simvastatin for Brain Complications and Mechanisms of Action
results.text_hl: Independent studies suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may reduce the risk of developing certain @<m>DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative disorders@@@.

results.title: Utilization of an Industry Byproduct, Corymbia maculata Leaves, by Aspergillus terreus to Produce Lovastatin
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@Lovastatin@@@ is chemically modified to produce @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, an important drug for the prevention of CVD and @<m>DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative disease@@@.

results.title: Modulatory effect of simvastatin on redox status, caspase-3 expression, p-protein kinase B (p-Akt), and brain-derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF) in an ethanol-induced neurodegeneration model.
results.text_hl: Seventy female Albino Swiss @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ were included and randomly divided into five groups: C, control group; E, @CHEMICAL_Ethanol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000431 @@@ethanol@@@ group; ES, group treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ from the first day of @CHEMICAL_Ethanol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000431 @@@ethanol@@@ intake; E + S, group treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ after @<m>DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegeneration@@@ development; and S, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group.

results.title: HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin ameliorates trimethyltin neurotoxicity and cognitive impairment through reversal of Alzheimer's-associated markers.

results.title: Simvastatin is the statin that most efficiently protects against kainate-induced excitotoxicity and memory impairment.
results.text_hl: Our results suggest that both @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ (but especially @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) may well have therapeutic potential in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative diseases@@@ involving excitotoxicity and @DISEASE_Memory_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D008569 @@@memory impairment@@@, including @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@.
